info.title: urltomarkdown - OpenAPI 3.1
info.description:
Provides a web service that accesses a requested web page and outputs a markdown version.

Source code for the web service is available at [the urltomarkdown repository](https://github.com/macsplit/urltomarkdown)

get.description: Outputs a markdown version of the page.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The address of the web page.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Whether to prepend an inline title. This parameter expects the values "true" or "false" only.

parameters.name: links
parameters.description: Whether to mark up links. This parameter expects the values "true" or "false" only.

X-Title.description: The title of the web page.

400.description: Could not access or convert web page.

post.summary: Convert a web page with HTML supplied
post.description: Outputs a markdown version of the page.

url.description: The original URL of the web page.

html.description: The HTML source of the web page.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Whether to prepend an inline title. This parameter expects the values "true" or "false" only.

parameters.name: links
parameters.description: Whether to mark up links. This parameter expects the values "true" or "false" only.

X-Title.description: The title of the web page.
